name: The Purgatorium
description:
WASD - Move

Spacebar - Jump

You have died and your soul was transferred to the purgatory. 

Unfortunately , the purgatory trials is broken and malfunctioned. None of the departed ones can escape. leaving them hopeless and eventually stop trying.

Your goal is to find a way to escape.

Don't bother reasoning with this game, you can't. He is unreasonably THICC for sure.

This game is for Summer Loaf Game Jam.

It's my first time working on a 3D game in Unity.

Asset used:

"Skybox" by Clod 

assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/skybox-4183

"Procedural fire" by Hovl Studio

assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/fire-explosions/procedural-f...

"Snaps Prototype | Sci-Fi / Industrial" by Asset Store Originals

assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/snaps-prototype-sci...

Player and NPC models made by me.
